mapper.sql:
where delete_flag = 0
and unit_type like CONCAT('%', #{obj.keyWords}, '%')
mapper.select: select count(1) as rowTotal from requester_unit_type

select
from requester_unit_type where delete_flag=0 and checked=1 ORDER BY sorting asc
